attributes.action: Stop the Government taking more of our hard earned money through higher taxes
attributes.additional_details: Now is the time to stand together and say no. Enough is enough! You are taking from us, and we will not accept it any longer. REMEMBER WITHOUT US THEY HAVE NOTHING!
attributes.background: Rising taxes take more from hardworking families at a time when the cost of living is already unbearable. Instead of draining our pockets, the Government should focus on managing its spending responsibly and supporting growth, not punishing people for earning a living.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "No more tax rises in this Parliament" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733612
